title: Remove background from heart icon image on the post-Yes (Valentine) page

requirements.text: Update the decorative heart icon image used on the page shown after clicking the “Yes” button (ValentinePage) so the icon background is fully transparent (no visible box/solid background) and the icons blend cleanly with the page background.

quotes: please when i click to the yes bouton it shows another page and in this page there is some heart icons i want to remove the background of this icons

acceptanceCriteria: On the ValentinePage (the page shown after clicking “Yes”), the decorative heart icon image renders with a transparent background (no solid/rectangular background visible).
Transparency is preserved in both light and dark mode overlays (no halo/solid matte around the image background).

requirements.text: Keep the ValentinePage layout and existing asset references unchanged while applying the transparency fix (do not change the image src path, sizing, or spacing).
acceptanceCriteria: ValentinePage continues to reference the same image path for the icon set: "/assets/generated/heart-icons-set.dim_256x256.png".
No changes to the ValentinePage positioning/sizing classes for the icon image (only the underlying image transparency changes).

constraints: Do not add backend functionality; this change must be handled entirely via frontend static assets.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the copy/text content of the Valentine pages.
Do not redesign the page or change animations; only remove the icon image background.

edits: Remove the background to make it fully transparent (heart-icons-set.dim_256x256.png > heart-icons-set.dim_256x256.png)
